Posts.Content: I've had lumpectomy n just had first chemo on weds...side effects kicking in now...due for more surgery after 3Fec b 3 t.....I stopped work the day I was diagnosed, couldn't cope mentally with work n family whilst dealing with this carp...take all the help you can....n best wishes....go do battle...then win the war
Posts.Title: About to start chemo .a question or two..?...

Posts.Content: I think it's called young breast cancer. Have just joined but forgotten name! Lol...you av to send a friend request...I got young kids too....17 n 9....take all the help u can... av had lumpectomy n just had first chemo, then more surgery after that's done....good luck to ya n keep strong xx
